intro: ^Mrslee?Smiling "You want a cookie? Eddie left them with me. I want to share with all my friends."
Chat1: ^Mrslee?Smiling "No! He baked them at school and brought them home. Almond cookies, made entirely with no milk and no eggs. His friend is allergic, so he learns recipes."

s: ^That's so sweet! I love that he brought you treats.
^They smell great! Tell me about the rest of your day?

Chat2: ^Mrslee?Smiling "OH. I forgot to tell you! I went to doctor's office. Doctor was a "SHE," and she was very, very smart. I feel like I understand more things now."
^Mrslee?Smiling "I never knew I had so many questions. But I asked them all and she answered. She has a kind face."

s: ^Yay!! Do you want to talk about the appointment?

QuestIntro: ^Mrslee?Smiling "You know. Eddie's very important to me and I talk about him a lot. I talk about him to the doctor too."

s: ^I think you're both lucky to have such a deep connection.
^You hope you talked about yourself, too!

QuestDetails1: ^Mrslee?Smiling "I ask question about his blood pressure. You know, it's very funny!"
^Mrslee?Smiling "I ask so many question about his Eddie, and the doctor remind me to ask about ME!"
^Mrslee?Smiling "I want to know everything, and I feel so much less stress talking to the doctor."

s: ^That IS funny! Did you learn anything new?

OptionalQuestDetails1: ^Mrslee?Smiling "Doctor said "Mrs. Lee. Your blood pressure is ... a VERY good number." She asked how I feel. Lots of questions about me."

s: ^Did you come away with more questions?

QuestDetails2: ^Mrslee?Smiling "We talk about my headache. You know! My eye exam was so bad! She suggest I get glasses. So, I invited a friend from fitness class to go with me."
^Mrslee?Smiling "That's why I am getting aching like this. My eyes work so hard. So my head is aching. I will get glasses and my headache will stop."

s: ^I hope you feel very accomplished, Mrs. Lee!

QuestAcceptance: ^Mrslee?Smiling "I am thinking about this. My health is very important, too! Doctor suggest I should think about how to continue a good health practice for the future."
^Mrslee?Smiling "She understand. Knows just what to say. She says I take better care of Eddie by taking care of me."

s: ^I love that she understood! I'll be back after I brainstorm some.
^I want to ask some people for their ideas; be right back.

Goodbye: ^Mrslee?Smiling "OK. I will sit here and think too."
